item.description:
Planned Parenthood of Connecticut is hosting a young professionals happy hour at Temple Bar & Grill.

Come learn what the nation's leading organization for women's health is doing to protect reproductive rights in the U.S. and around the globe.

A $10 donation gets you a wristband for $5 martinis and $1 off all imported and domestic beer.

Come out and mingle with a young, fun and like-minded crowd. And learn how to get involved....

For more info e-mail Maggie Yolen at Margaret.Yolen@ppct.org

NHC contact: Dana (315) 396-3669
item.name: Thur. 8/23 - Pro-Cocktail & Pro-Choice? - Here's a social event for you!
